name: Fantasy Football Live Draft Tool
description:
Fantasy football live drafts can be hectic and nerve-wracking. It can be easy to get lost in a sea of information when trying to make a pick with limited time. This interactive, customizable tool will help make your live draft experience smoother and more manageable.


Before the Draft

  • Set custom rankings and tiers for each position
  • Input custom dollar values for salary cap drafts


During the Draft

  • Cross players off your list as they are drafted
  • Mark players with green or red indicators to denote players to target or avoid
  • Easily see which players from which tiers are remaining
